column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////lt's a good place to hang with friends. If you eat here you def should order their tapas! Me and my friends all like the sausage with potato
column2: the octopus and the shrimps.  If you would order the octopus
column3: get the grilled one instead of the fried rings(calamari).  ...  For the drink
column7: but their mango sangria is very tasty.  When finishing the meal with desserts
column8: I love the caramel flan and the mango sorbet.
